features.conversation: Context-aware AI conversations with 7-day memory per channel. Supports multiple personalities and natural language understanding
features.education: Professional tutoring system for all grade levels with detailed explanations and step-by-step solutions
features.web_search: Real-time web search with citations from Google Custom Search and DuckDuckGo fallback
features.news: Bilingual news system with CNN (English) and Vietnamese sources (VnExpress, Tuổi Trẻ)
features.moderation: Complete moderation suite with logging, auto-moderation, role protection, and custom messages
features.giveaways: Full giveaway management with automatic winner selection and participant tracking
features.confession_system: Anonymous confession system with moderation controls
features.training_data: Custom Q&A training data per server (Premium feature)
features.multi_language: Full Vietnamese and English support with server-based language switching
features.premium_features: Custom bots, custom commands, scheduled messages, advanced automation

help_topics.getting_started: To start using Lena, invite her to your server and set a language using !setlang vi or !setlang en. Then you can chat by mentioning @Lena or using the keyword 'lena'
help_topics.change_prefix: Use !setprefix <new> to change the command prefix. Example: !setprefix ? will change all commands to ?command
help_topics.change_personality: Use /setmode to switch between 6 personalities: lena, tutor, technical, developer, casual, professional
help_topics.setup_moderation: Visit the dashboard at your-domain/dashboard to configure moderation, auto-delete, auto-roles, and action logging
help_topics.premium_features: Premium unlocks custom bots, unlimited custom commands, scheduled messages, training data, and priority support. Visit /dashboard/pricing

troubleshooting.bot_not_responding: Check if bot has permission to read/send messages in the channel. Check allowed channels in dashboard settings
troubleshooting.commands_not_working: Make sure you're using the correct prefix (default is !). Check with !ping to see if bot is online
troubleshooting.no_search_results: Search requires internet access. If persistent, try again later or contact support
troubleshooting.language_issues: Set server language with !setlang vi or !setlang en. This affects all bot responses and search results
